item.description:
On Saturday, May 1 (rain date May 2), the CAPE Group will visit the Marginal Way in Ogunquit, ME and Nubble Lighthouse in York/Cape Neddick, ME.

Our first stop will be the Marginal Way in Ogunquit, ME. We'll meet at the South end of the Marginal Way nearest Perkins Cove. Parking can be difficult, please see below for more information. We'll plan to walk the entire 1.5 mile path and you can stop to photograph at your own pace along the way.

After the Marginal Way we'll meet back in the parking area and head out to grab a bite to eat before driving down to Nubble Lighthouse at sunset. We'll meet in the parking area at Nubble Lighthouse.

Parking can be difficult at both locations. If you can, I suggest carpooling whenever possible. Please utilize the CAPE Group Message Board to find or share a ride.

Please be sure to check back for updated information.



Parking for the Marginal Way:

It looks like parking for the Marginal Way can run anywhere from $8/day to $3 per hour. These lots may not take credit cards so it may be smart to have cash on hand for parking fees.

Parking fees for Marginal Way

More information on parking.

Map of Perkins Cove & Marginal Way


Parking for Cape Neddick:

There is a parking area at the Sohier Park Welcome Center at Nubble Lighthouse.

Cape Neddick (Nubble) Map
item.name: Marginal Way and Sunset at Cape Neddick (Nubble) Lighthouse
